artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a woman on the left in a gray and white striped gown, a gray muff with black stripes, and a gray hat with black detailing and plumes; in the center a man in a black breeches, socks, and coat with a sword at his side with a blue hilt; on the right a woman in a black gown with white/gray trim, white gloves, and a whitish hat with black detailing and gray plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Onzième Cahier, 11 Mars 1789
